scripts.babel-watch: npm run babel-watch-src & npm run babel-watch-tests &
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec 'mocha -R spec libtests/**/*.js | ./node_modules/bunyan/bin/bunyan --color -l fatal' --watch lib --watch libtests
scripts.test: rm -rf libtests ; babel tests --out-dir libtests --source-maps && mocha libtests/**/*.js | ./node_modules/bunyan/bin/bunyan -l fatal; rm -r libtests
scripts.coverage: mocha --compilers js:babel/register -r blanket -R html-cov tests/**/*.js | ./node_modules/bunyan/bin/bunyan -l fatal > coverage.html && open coverage.html
scripts.coverage-istanbul: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --  --check-leaks libtests/**/*.js && open coverage/lcov-report/index.html
